Intro to Religious Studies, Fall 2018

This is the webpage for Prof. Kassor's RLST 100 course (Fall '18). Here is where you'll find readings, documents, and all information relevant to the course. If you want to find Connie outside of class, she's in Main Hall 411, and her office hours are Mondays 11am-Noon.

contact

  • Office Hours: Mondays 3:30-4:30pm
  • or by appointment
  • or just drop by -- really.
